sentences.en: Amid signs of resurgent amphetamine abuse, the PPP unashamedly talks of reviving it.
sentences.cn: 在滥用安非他明重又死灰复燃的种种迹象中, PPP坦然讨论重启该项调查.

sentences.en: At the same time, some the potential threats from the resurgent state sector are also overblown.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 重新复苏的国有部门形成的一些潜在威胁也被过分夸大.

sentences.en: Dr. DeLay cautioned countries to maintain against resurgent pandemic.
sentences.cn: 戴雷尔告诫各国应保持警惕,以防艾滋病的蔓延势头再度转强.

sentences.en: Economists worry that this may be only the tip of the icecream - berg: inflation seems to resurgent.
sentences.cn: 经济学家担心,这种现象也许只是“冰淇淋山”的一角: 通货膨胀似乎即将卷土重来.

sentences.en: It would be better to be bolder and fix the SOEs while the economy is resurgent.
sentences.cn: 在经济复苏之时当即对国企实施大胆的整顿应当会更合适.

sentences.en: Many equity markets enjoyed further strong gains on Tuesday, fuelled by the resurgent financial sector.
sentences.cn: 在金融业复苏的推动下,全球许多股票市场周二进一步强劲攀升.

sentences.en: Miners paint a picture of an already resurgent Chinese economy that would allow for small reduction.
sentences.cn: 矿业公司认为,由于中国经济已经开始复苏,降价幅度可以小一些.
再次抬头的法西斯主义

sentences.en: The resurgent luxury property market is about 25 per cent higher than pre - crisis levels.
sentences.cn: 高端房地产市场比危机前回升约25%.

trans.tran_en: growing and becoming more popular, after a period of quietness
